fields.title: L'Oreal Hyaluronic Acid Serum
fields.info: This serum is designed to hydrate and plump the skin, reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles.

fields.title: L'Oreal Night Cream
fields.info: Night cream enriched with moisturizing ingredients to nourish the skin overnight, leaving it soft and supple.

fields.title: Dr Organic Tea Tree Face Wash

file.url: products/Dr Organic Tea Tree Face Wash.jpg

fields.info: Gentle face wash infused with tea tree oil, known for its antibacterial properties, to cleanse and refresh the skin.

fields.title: Nivea Nourishing Cocoa
fields.info: Rich cocoa butter formula to deeply nourish and hydrate dry skin, leaving it smooth and radiant.

fields.title: Nivea Shea Smooth
fields.info: Shea butter-infused lotion for intensive moisturization, perfect for dry and rough skin.

fields.title: Maybelline Fit Me Foundation
fields.info: Lightweight foundation that mattifies and refines pores, offering natural coverage for a flawless complexion.

fields.title: LA Colors Matte Lipstick
fields.info: Long-lasting matte lipstick available in a range of vibrant shades, providing a velvety finish.

fields.title: Cantu Leave-In Conditioner
fields.info: Leave-in conditioner infused with shea butter and natural oils to deeply moisturize and detangle hair.

fields.title: L'Oreal Hair Oil
fields.info: Nourishing hair oil enriched with botanical extracts to add shine and manageability to all hair types.

fields.title: Argan Hand & Nail Cream
fields.info: Luxurious hand and nail cream infused with argan oil to deeply hydrate and soften hands and cuticles.

fields.title: Silver Necklace
fields.info: Elegant silver necklace featuring a delicate chain and a timeless design, perfect for everyday wear or special occasions.

fields.title: Hair Brush
fields.info: Detangling hairbrush with soft bristles, suitable for all hair types and lengths.
